scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others --prefix "[{name}]" --names "emulator,server,client" "npm run emulator" "npm run server" "npm run client"
scripts.server: cd backend && PORT=3001 npm run dev
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.clean: pkill -f firebase || true && pkill -f ts-node-dev || true && pkill -f react-scripts || true
